desc: Foundation in mathematics, and algorithms. Emphasis in biological models. Minor in Bioinformatics & Quantitative Biology

org: UC Davis, Dept. of Environmental Science & Policy
desc: Under supervision of Professor Alan Hastings, Ph.D. Collaborative research group operating between UC Davis and University of Colorado- Boulder in order to investigate biological problems concerning the spatial population dynamics of flour beetles

org: UC Davis, Dept. of Microbiology & Molecular Genetics
desc: Under supervision of Professors Mariel Vazquez, Ph.D and Javiar Arsuaga Ph.D. Application of knot theory, statistics, and low dimensional topology to structural biology in order to infer 3D organization of human genome.

org: UC Davis, School of Medicine, Dept. of Pharmacology
desc: Under supervision of Professor Daisuke Sato, Ph.D. Investigation of therapies to improve preventative care for cardiovascular diseases through mathematical and multiscale modeling of the heart.

org: Stanford Medicine, Dept. of Developmental Biology
desc:
Under supersvision of Professor David Kingsley, Ph.D. 
By using a combination of genetic and genomic approaches to identify the detailed molecular mechanisms that control evolutionary change in vertebrates, we aim to gain insights to identify these fundamental mechanisms that control the changes of new traits in different species, including ourselves.
Under supersvision of Professor Michael Cherry, Ph.D.
Specialization in machine learning & artificial intelligence. Relevant coursework: neural networks, recommendation systems & web mining, and biomedical NLP

org: UC San Diego, Bioinformatics & Systems Biology Program
desc: Under supervision of Professor Ludmil B. Alexandrov.
Defending my thesis, finding the world's best taco, and hoping my succulents survive without me.
